name: Snakin It!
description:
Snakin It! Is a 3D game where you collect fruits to get bigger and try not to crash!

I RECOMMEND PLAYING ON A CONTROLLER CAUSE IT FEELS SO GOOD 

Controls:

Left: A

Right: D

Jump: Spacebar

Look Left: Left Arrow

Look Right: Right Arrow

Rear View: Q

(Multiplayer Mode Coming Soon)

Music By: Tohomoko https://soundcloud.com/replay-368202368

A Lovely Day By The Beach: https://soundcloud.com/replay-368202368/a-lovely-day-at-the-beach

The game works with most controllers as well! #adventure #action #strategy #survival #arcade

The game works with a lot of controllers as well!
